text: Stefano Marcia (born November 23, 1993) is a South African sailor. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's Laser event, in which he placed 40th. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:South African male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of South Africa Category:Sailors at the 2016 Summer Olympics – Laser
title: Stefano Marcia
